page.title: 02CUMBERNAULD,WHERE I LIVE
page.content: I live in Westfield ,an area in Cumbernauld New Town.Cumbernauld was built to house people from the{ {"Glasgow Overspill"}.The Glasgow Overspill scheme began about thirty years ago to provide houses for people who could not find a house in the{ {City of Glasgow.}There was not enough land in Glasgow to build the number of houses which people needed so the government began to build{New Towns} away from the city.In 1955 the land between Cumbernauld Village and Condorrat Village was chosen as the site for{Cumbernauld New Town.}Since then the population has grown to 50,000 and should go to 70,000 by the end of the century. When the new town is complete it will have done its job and provided a place to live for many people whose roots are in Glasgow.
